title: Bug 109718 - Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR THE USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put the mouse on the text item

Expected Result: The tips should be shown in the given format
Actual Result: The tips are shown in one line
OB: When putting large content in a text item, the tips are displayed in one line instead of the expected format
EB: The tips in the text item should be displayed in the given format
SR:
1. Open the software
2. Go to the text item
3. Put a large content in the text item
4. Save the text item
5. Put the mouse on the text item to view the tips

Observe that the tips are displayed in one line instead of the expected format
